title: Visma-Lease a Bike Unveils ‘Dream Team’ for 2025 Tour de France Showdown with Pogačar
content:
Yates, Campenaerts are key additions in Visma-Lease a Bike's bolstered lineup for this summer's epic 'super team' clash with Pogačar and UAE Emirates XRG.

Read the full article at Visma-Lease a Bike Unveils ‘Dream Team’ for 2025 Tour de France Showdown with Pogačar on Velo.
author: ahood
